index.content: index → int (Read Only): The monitor position in the list.

isPrimary.content: isPrimary → bool (Read Only): Returns true, if this monitor is the primary display.

isAffinity.content: isAffinity → bool (Read Only): Returns true, if this monitor is connected to the GPU that has been selected for GPU Affinity. Always True if GPU Affinity is not used.

width.content: width → int (Read Only): The width of the monitor area, measured in pixels.

height.content: height → int (Read Only): The height of the monitor area, measured in pixels.

left.content: left → int (Read Only): The position of left edge of the monitor area, measured in pixels.

right.content: right → int (Read Only): The position of right edge of the monitor area, measured in pixels.

top.content: top → int (Read Only): The position of top edge of the monitor area, measured in pixels.

bottom.content: bottom → int (Read Only): The position of bottom edge of the monitor area, measured in pixels.

displayName.content: displayName → str (Read Only): The unique display name associated with this monitor.

description.content: description → str (Read Only): A description of the monitor or its display adapter.

dpiScale.content: dpiScale → float (Read Only): The DPI Scaling factor the monitor is current set to.

scaledWidth.content: scaledWidth → int (Read Only): The width of the monitor area, measured in points.

scaledHeight.content: scaledHeight → int (Read Only): The height of the monitor area, measured in points.

scaledLeft.content: scaledLeft → int (Read Only): The position of left edge of the monitor area, measured in points.

scaledRight.content: scaledRight → int (Read Only): The position of right edge of the monitor area, measured in points.

scaledTop.content: scaledTop → int (Read Only): The position of top edge of the monitor area, measured in points.

scaledBottom.content: scaledBottom → int (Read Only): The position of bottom edge of the monitor area, measured in points.

serialNumber.content: serialNumber → str (Read Only): The serial number name associated with this monitor. May be blank.

refreshRate.content: refreshRate → float (Read Only): The refresh rate the monitor is currently running at.

Accessing_Monitors.title: Accessing Monitors
Accessing_Monitors.content: [edit] See Monitors Class for examples on how to access individual monitors. TouchDesigner Build: Latest\n2021.100002018.28070before 2018.28070
